The slacks arrived in a clear plastic bag folded in half and forced into my mailbox.  The cloth is not flimsy, and the product was as advertized.  I have two of these already, though one, my favorite fit, is branded by Lee, "Comfort" not "Motion."  It was an older version.  This particular purchase is a bit long and a bit tight around the waist, though it is the same exact size as the other.  It fits just okay, but I wish it fit like the first "Comfort" one I bought.  I ordered 36" x 29", which is a tough size to get in stores.  The same product on the Lee website is listed as $55.00.  Perhaps they changed the supplier which makes them, and that is the reason it is a tiny bit longer and tighter around the waist.
